Introduction to Economics

In this module, you will learn how to apply economics to make informed decisions through the study of key economic principles. You will be introduced to key principles and fundamental concepts of Economics; Scarcity and Choice, Resource Allocation, Demand and Supply, Efficiency, Equilibrium, Macro stabilization and many more.

Learning Objectives for this module:

+  Demonstrate knowledge and understanding of key economic concepts and principles. [Knowledge & Understanding, Learning].

+  Understand and apply basic concepts and understand how these can be important for economic analysis (opportunity cost, marginal analysis, etc.). [Analysis and Application].

+  Apply economic analysis to different business and/or societal situations (scarcity and choice, dis/equilibrium, etc.). [Problem Solving & Application].

+  Evaluate and analyse arguments in basic macroeconomics (government involvement, macro-environment for strategic analysis, etc.). [Analysis and Application].
